/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, buildings can be seen, their details softened by the distance. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
